modName: Mod Organizer Dracula Theme Scroll Bar Fix
summary: Fixes the horizontal scroll bar on Mod Organizers Dracula Theme.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]The most current versions of Mod Organizer comes with a couple of Default Themes.  My favorite one being the Dracula Theme.  But it has one serious flaw.  The horizontal scroll bar is not usable do to being set at 1 pixel tall! [b] (WTF!!!) [/b] So, I fixed it.

To install, simply drop the "dracula.qss" file into the Mod Organizer's [b]Stylesheets [/b]folder that is located wherever you have MO installed and overwrite.

Example location:  "steamapps/Common/Skyrim/Mod Organizer/stylesheets"
[/size]
author: the Ice Devil
